## Exercise set 3-1

1. Calculate least-squares intercept *a* and least-squares slope *b* for the `anscombe` data. 

I will use equations 3.8 and 3.9. 

```{r}
x <- anscombe$x1
y <- anscombe$y1

xbar <- mean(x)
ybar <- mean(y)

b <- sum((x - xbar)*(y - ybar)) / sum((x - xbar)^2)
b

a <- ybar - b*xbar
a

# Check using lm
m1 <- lm(y ~ x)
summary(m1)
```
